casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Stacy SMITH Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2017 Daniel M. Erwin, assigned counsel, and Kevin M. Smith, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Nancy L. Walker, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 172 , 166 A.3d 691 (2017), is denied.
